name: kings-shield
effect: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack
stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.
